Question: What is the name of the tax levied pursuant to the City Code, Title II, Article VII, Chapter 258 in Pittsburgh?
What is the rate of tax for the Payroll Tax in Pittsburgh?

What is the method of computing payroll expense attributable to the City of Pittsburgh for employers whose employees perform work or render services partly within and partly outside of the City of Pittsburgh?
Answer: Percentage of total number of working hours employed within the City of Pittsburgh compared to the total number of working hours employed within and outside of the City of Pittsburgh

Question: How long does an employer have to file a return and pay the tax if it conducts business in the City of Pittsburgh on a temporary, seasonal, or itinerant basis?
What is the formula that Partners and Self-employed individuals who have Compensation from sources within and without Pennsylvania may use to apportion their Compensation to the City?
Answer: The formula used reporting personal income tax on Form PA-40, 61 Pa. Code ยง 109.5, by substituting the word "City" for the "Commonwealth" where necessary

Question: What is the time period for which data supporting the formula used to apportion Taxable Distributions must be maintained for Partners and Self-employed individuals?
What is the period of time for which an employer that ceases to carry on a Business during any tax quarter may be entitled to receive a prorated refund of the tax paid?
Answer: The period of time he was not in Business during the tax quarter
